desc:
Take a look at https://github.com/fiatjaf/nostr, join the group at https://t.me/nostr_protocol.

Write a special kind of Nostr relay that also implements (part of?) the ActivityPub/LitePub and protocol creates Mastodon/ActivityPub accounts on-the-fly for every Nostr pubkey that publishes to it, such that people on a Mastodon server can follow these accounts without having to know what Nostr is.

The code must be open-source.
head: Write a bridge between Mastodon and Nostr
